data.title: Helfrich Tool and Die Corporation
data.meta_description: Made in California manufacturer Helfrich Tool and Die Corp. is a leading provider of stamped metal parts and components for industrial or commercial projects.
data.text:
Custom Metal Stamping since 1948. Helfrich Tool & Die Corp. is a leading provider of stamped metal parts and components for your unique industrial or commercial projects. Our Metal Stamping services can be created and designed in stainless steel, aluminum, brass, copper, sheet and steel stamped metals.

Products and Services

Metal Stamping Company - Tool & Die Makers - Since 1948

Helfrich Tool & Die Corp. began its Metal Stamping - Tool and Die Company from our humble beginnings in the 1930's by the grandfather of the company's President, John C. Helfrich. The small job shop in Gardenia, California (Los Angeles area) committed to providing a quality tool die making and custom metal stamping company that evolved into a high quality industrial job shop with competitive pricing.

Through the years and three generations of the Helfrich family company, close loyalties developed with customers who could count on their die metal stamping or die making tool job being done right and shipped on time.

Manufacturing Processes

Metal Stamped Custom Parts and Components

Helfrich Tool excels in producing a limitless variety and sizes of custom stamped metal parts used in industrial and commercial assemblies, all made to your exact specifications.

Welding Services

Welding Services for your industrial resource and in house special requirements for a wide range of metal working machining applications. Production to prototype, large or small welding and joining of metals.

Tool Die Job Shop Key Tooling Benefits:

Over 100 years of combined Tool Die Maker job experience

Die creation and design from your existing part.

Guaranteed Die Tooling part production to match precise tool specifications.

Completed In House Metal Finishes with Various Surface Treatments include:
